page.title: 02A History Of The Farm
page.content: Centuries ago ,{Hays Wharf}, a London company made a good living on the south bank of the River Thames . But this business came to an end , and they sold land near London Bridge . With the proceeds they bought some farms , one of them was the{Hursley {Park Estate}, just south of this area. It was built in 1801 by the Cooper family . Hays Wharf thus became a Property Company . In 1974 they were taken over by{St.Martins Property {Corporation}, and a year later this became a subsiduary of the{Kuwait {Investment Office}. Even though the land now belongs to Arabs , the same man runs it as when it was owned by Hays Wharf . It is used as a livestock and arable farm .
